snippet: As he prepares to fight Marcos Maidana in a welterweight world title bout Saturday night, Floyd Mayweather Jr. has come to rely on Leonard Ellerbe, his longtime adviser and the chief executive of Mayweather Promotions.
abstract: Floyd Mayweather Jr has had many volatile swings in his 18-year career, but through it all his longtime adviser Leonard Ellerbe has been a steady, centering force; Ellerbe is the rare person who can penetrate Mayweather’s bravado, talking him out of rash, unwise decisions or encouraging him to take a reluctant step that could prove beneficial.
lead_paragraph: As he prepares to fight Marcos Maidana in a welterweight world title bout Saturday night, Floyd Mayweather Jr. has come to rely on Leonard Ellerbe, his longtime adviser and the chief executive of Mayweather Promotions.

headline.main: In Mayweather’s Corner, and in the Corner Office
